This site contains all of the features required for the FMdB Pro minimum viable product.

This is the Dashboard, where the user will be taken after logging in. This screen will be fully customizable with whichever widgets the users prefers.

Comparison to Scout7 Dashboard| |Adding a widget to the Scout7 dashboard
Scouting Planner
8 matches assigned/4 matches to assign
Scouting History
320 total reports
Reports
4 new reports in the past 24 hours

Watford Dashboard Requests:

  • A bespoke dashboard that can be manipulated by each user to what they wish to have shown on their ‘homepage’
  • ‘Widgets’ to be added in by the user to support the scouting & recruitment process with statistical insights as directed by specific needs
  • Each scout has a unique login.
  • A ‘master’ login for Senior personnel (i.e. Owner, CEO, Sporting/Technical Director) who can see all activity on the platform and dictate specific viewing restrictions for staff.
